additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: FULL CREAM MILK, SUGAR, COCOA BUTTER, COCOA MASS, MILK SOLIDS, EMULSIFIERS (SOY LECITHIN, 476), FLAVOURS. MILK CHOCOLATE CONTAINS COCOA SOLIDS 26%, MILK SOLIDS MINIMUM 24%.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Tree Nuts, May Be Present Peanuts, Contains Soy, Contains Milk

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: The equivalent of a glass and a half of full cream milk in every 200g of Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate.

description: Cadbury Flake is the crumbliest Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate.
name: Flake Chocolate Bar
